organization.fullName: Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

identificationModule.briefTitle: Engineered TILs/CAR-TILs to Treat Advanced Solid Tumors
identificationModule.officialTitle: Engineered TILs/CAR-TILs With PD1 Knockout and Anti-PD1/CTLA4-scFv Secreting or CARs Against Various Antigens to Treat Advanced Solid Tumors

leadSponsor.name: Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

collaborators.name: Guangdong Zhaotai InVivo Biomedicine Co. Ltd.

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Tumor infiltration lymphocytes (TILs) have been harvested from advanced cancer patients and constructed to knockout PD1 gene and express scFvs against both PD1 and CTALA4 and CARs against various antigens, followed by transfusion into the patients. The safety, tolerance, and preliminary clinical efficacy of the TILs will be evaluated.

armGroups.label: TILs/CAR-TILs treatment
armGroups.description: Obtain TILs/CAR-TILs from advanced solid tumor patients and infuse them back to evaluate safety and clinical efficacy of the treatment.
interventionNames: Biological: TILs and CAR-TILs targeting HER2, Mesothelin, PSCA, MUC1, Lewis-Y, GPC3, AXL, EGFR, Claudin18.2/6, ROR1, GD1, or B7-H3

interventions.name: TILs and CAR-TILs targeting HER2, Mesothelin, PSCA, MUC1, Lewis-Y, GPC3, AXL, EGFR, Claudin18.2/6, ROR1, GD1, or B7-H3
interventions.description: TILs and CAR-TILs injection: 1-10Ã—10e7/kg cells for each treatment; 3 or more cycles.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Safety of TILs/CAR-TILs treatment in advanced solid cancers
primaryOutcomes.description: Assessing Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Primary clinical efficacy of the TILs/CAR-TILs treatment in advanced solid cancers
secondaryOutcomes.description: Assessing various clinical response rates including complete response, partial response, stable disease, and progress disease during and after TILs/CAR-TILs treatment in advanced solid cancers.

overallOfficials.name: Zhenfeng Zhang, MD, PhD
overallOfficials.affiliation: Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

locations.facility: Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University
